original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho
sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho
dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
anidassanaappaṭigho adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
